ModMetaData.name: Bunk Beds
ModMetaData.author: Darknote
ModMetaData.description: Expand your furniture collection with an all new, space-efficient pawn storing method, bunk beds! This innovative solution allows you to store up to 3 pawns in the same 2 tiles, saving a bunch of space in your base. The mod comes with two versions of the bunk bed, one with 2 beds and one with 3.
